Title: Traffic Light Simulation Application
Description: Traffic Light Simulation application simulates traffic on a 2D plane under different traffic light control schemes. The interface will display a 10x10 grid where each street allows one-way traffic and there is one traffic light at each intersection.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Traffic Light Simulation application simulates traffic on a 2D plane under different traffic light control schemes. The interface will display a 10x10 grid where each street allows one-way traffic and there is one traffic light at each intersection.

This project is not finished, all files and the finished product will be uploaded on here by May 2, 2012.
